Headline: #73 Armitage Temporary Reroute near Elston/Cortland
ShortDescription: 73 buses temp. rerouted EB: Cortland, Ashland, North Ave, Elston and Cortland  ; WB: Cortland, Elston, North Ave, Ashland and Armitage near Elston/Cortland

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Elston/Cortland due to police activity near Elston/Cortland.

Eastbound buses will operate via Cortland, Ashland, North Avenue, Elston and Cortland including the normal route streets.

Westbound buses will operate via Cortland, Elston, North Avenue, Ashland and Armitage.

Allow extra travel time.
